page.title: 12CHILDRENS GAMES IN DUNSCROFT
page.content: Apart from small versions of major sports-soccer & rounders, the most popular games involved a ball and some kind of chase or hide and seek. The most popular ones are 'Two baller' a pure ballgame , 'Block' a pure chasing game, & 'Sticks' which is both a ball and chasing game. In sticks you need three sticks a ball and the minimum of two players. One player has the ball and the others stand out of the way. The person with the ball tries to hit the sticks with it,and when he does he throws the ball . He then has to set up the sticks before another player comes with the ball. If it is set up again before they come back then you are on and the game starts all over again.
